item.title: Are Large-scale Soft Labels Necessary for Large-scale Dataset Distillation?
item.description: Large-scale dataset distillation can be achieved with significantly less soft labels by using class-wise supervision during image synthesis, enabling simple random label pruning and enhancing model ac…
